name: seo-optimization
description: SEO optimization, metadata, and discoverability improvements
author: Claude Code

tasks.name: Run SEO Audit
tasks.prompt:
Perform SEO audit:

1. Analyze current SEO status:
   - Meta tags on all pages
   - Open Graph tags
   - Twitter Card tags
   - Structured data
   - XML sitemap
   - robots.txt
2. Check technical SEO:
   - Page load speed
   - Mobile responsiveness
   - HTTPS configuration
   - Canonical URLs
   - URL structure
3. Content analysis:
   - Heading hierarchy
   - Alt text on images
   - Internal linking
   - Content quality
4. Generate SEO report
5. Create improvement plan
6. Save to docs/SEO_AUDIT.md

tasks.name: Implement Metadata System
tasks.description: Add comprehensive metadata to all pages
tasks.prompt:
Implement metadata system:

1. Create metadata utility in src/lib/metadata.ts
2. Add to all pages:
   - Title tags
   - Description meta tags
   - Open Graph tags
   - Twitter Card tags
   - Canonical URLs
3. Implement dynamic metadata:
   - Page-specific titles
   - Dynamic descriptions
   - Social media images
4. Add structured data (JSON-LD):
   - Organization schema
   - WebApplication schema
   - FAQ schema (if applicable)
5. Generate sitemap.xml
6. Configure robots.txt

tasks.name: Accessibility Audit & Fixes
tasks.prompt:
Perform accessibility audit:

1. Run automated accessibility tests:
   - Lighthouse accessibility score
   - axe DevTools
   - WAVE evaluation
2. Check for:
   - Proper heading hierarchy
   - ARIA labels and roles
   - Keyboard navigation
   - Color contrast ratios
   - Focus indicators
   - Alt text on images
   - Form labels
3. Implement fixes:
   - Add missing ARIA labels
   - Improve keyboard navigation
   - Fix contrast issues
   - Add skip links
4. Test with screen readers
5. Generate accessibility report
6. Achieve WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance
